title: Cartouche, prince des faubourgs
overview: Paris at the beginning of the 18th Century. The adventurer, Cartouche, an ardent advocate of fairness, honor and liberty, opposes the omnipotence of the King. He fights with his compatriots for the rights of the 'common people', and against all those who try to repress them. A romantic adventure in the best tradition of Swash-buckler films.
